name: EVELYNN ADAMS
summary: I am a recent graduate who is interested and fascinated by Machine learning. I want to join this industry and be a part of it, learn and contribute towards both the growth of the company and me as an individual in terms of skills.
certifications: Certified Associate Level in Python Programming
summary_paragraph: Evelyyn Adams is a recent MCA (Computers) graduate from SPP University, Pune, and holds a BSc (Computer Science) from KTM College, Nashik.  She has experience as an Intern Trainee at E-Novate Labs, where she worked with neural networks and developed a supervised model for image recognition.  Her skills include Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Python, Java, ReactJS, and various data science libraries.  She also holds certifications in Python programming and has completed a project on Deep Learning assisted Image recognition.
